languages.text: "Попрощайся, дитя. Если ты с Вольным Торговцем однажды увидишься — то уже в качестве новатора Дома Орселлио".

traits.locale_text: "Попрощайся, дитя. Если ты с Вольным Торговцем однажды увидишься — то уже в качестве регента Дома Орселлио".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Say your farewells, child. Should you ever see the Rogue Trader again, it will be as the Novator of House Orsellio."
languages.original_text: "Попрощайся, дитя. Если ты с Вольным Торговцем однажды увидишься — то уже в качестве новатора Дома Орселлио".

traits.locale_text: "Say your farewells, child. Should you see the Rogue Trader ever again, it will be as the novator of House Orsellio."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Say your farewells, child. Should you see the Rogue Trader ever again, it will be as the novator of House Orsellio."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Say your farewells, child. Should you ever see the Rogue Trader again, it will be as the Novator of House Orsellio."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Say your farewells, child. Should you ever see the Rogue Trader again, it will be as the Novator of House Orsellio."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Say your farewells, child. Should you ever see the Rogue Trader again, it will be as the Novator of House Orsellio."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “是时候告别了，孩子。当你再次见到这位行商浪人的时候，你将会是奥赛罗家族的大族长。”
languages.original_text: "Say your farewells, child. Should you ever see the Rogue Trader again, it will be as the Novator of House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: “是时候告别了，孩子。当你再次见到这位行商浪人的时候，你将会是奥塞罗家族的大族长。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Despídete, pequeña. Si vuelves a ver a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, será como Novator de la casa Orsellio».
languages.original_text: "Say your farewells, child. Should you ever see the Rogue Trader again, it will be as the Novator of House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: «Despídete, pequeña. Si vuelves a ver a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, será como Novator de la casa Orsellio».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「別れの挨拶をせよ、子よ。お前が自由開拓者と再会するときは、オーセリオ家のノベイターとしてだ」
languages.original_text: "Say your farewells, child. Should you ever see the Rogue Trader again, it will be as the Novator of House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: 「別れの挨拶をせよ、子よ。お前が自由開拓者と再会するときは、オーセリオ家のノベイターとしてだ」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Nehmt nun Abschied, Kind. Solltet Ihr {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} jemals wiedersehen, dann als Novatorin des Hauses Orsellio."
languages.original_text: "Say your farewells, child. Should you ever see the Rogue Trader again, it will be as the Novator of House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: "Nehmt nun Abschied, Kind. Solltet Ihr {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} jemals wiedersehen, dann als Novatorin des Hauses Orsellio."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Faites vos adieux, Enfant. Si vous devez revoir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} un jour, ce sera en tant que Novator de la maison Orsellio. »
languages.original_text: "Say your farewells, child. Should you ever see the Rogue Trader again, it will be as the Novator of House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: « Faites vos adieux, mon enfant. Si vous devez revoir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} un jour, ce sera en tant que Novator de la maison Orsellio. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Vedanı et çocuğum. Olur da yollarınız kesişirse Hür Tacir'le bir sonraki görüşmeni Orsellio Hanesi'nin Rota Reisi olarak yapacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Say your farewells, child. Should you ever see the Rogue Trader again, it will be as the Novator of House Orsellio."

traits.locale_text: "Vedanı et çocuğum. Hür Tacir'le bir daha görüşürsen, bu görüşmeyi Orsellio Hanesi'nin Rota Reisi olarak yapacaksın."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
